text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus villegasiana is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is endemic to Colombia. It is most likely a synonym of Prunus subcorymbosa or Prunus integrifolia.
text.Sources: Calderon, E. (1998). "Prunus villegasiana". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38903A10154440. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38903A10154440.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
